Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

doBy v4.7.1 (Release date: )

  • align_coefs added.
  • File with pipe-friendly arithmetic added.

doBy v4.7.0 (Release date: 2025-06-29)2025-06-29

  • parseGroupFormula updated
  • head2() and tail2() for matrices added
  • pow() function added
  • Cleanups of code

doBy v4.6.27 (Release date: 2025-05-16)2025-05-16

  • pick1() and pick2() functions added. Short for extract with one or two brackets.
  • math_teachers data dataset added.

doBy v4.6.26 (Release date: 2025-04-02)2025-04-09

  • split_by() reworked
  • Various datasets added
  • add_pred(), add_resid(), reciprocal() functions added

doBy v4.6.25 (Release date: 2025-01-29)2025-01-30

  • Various minor changes; too many to remember.

doBy v4.6.24 (Release date: 2024-10-07)2024-10-07

  • response_plot function added.
  • file with matrix operations removed.

doBy v4.6.23 (Release date: )

  • income data added

doBy v4.6.22 (Release date: 2024-06-20)2024-06-21

  • Various internal cleanups

doBy v4.6.21 (Release date: )2024-04-29

  • crickets data added
  • Added function binomial_to_bernoulli_data, model_stability_glm, plot_lm
  • Functionality of split_byrow and split_bycol extended

doBy v4.6.20 (Release date: 2023-11-01)2023-11-01

Changes

  • smaller changes to expr_to_fun (length_nparm is argument)

doBy v4.6.19 (Release date: 2023-10-02)2023-10-02

Changes

  • Smaller changes in section_fun and related functions

doBy v4.6.18 (Release date: 2023-08-03)2023-08-07

Changes

  • R version requirement updated to ensure that Rs native pipe is available

doBy v4.6.17 (Release date: 2023-07-10)2023-07-12

Changes

  • bquote_fun_list removed again; too over engineered
  • Minor bug fixes
  • Improved documentation
  • Added functions: chr_to_matrix(), matrix_op()

doBy v4.6.16 (Release date: 2023-01-18)2023-01-18

Changes

  • bquote_fun_list added
  • Improved documentation

doBy v4.6.15 (Release date: 2022-12-08)2022-12-08

Changes

  • restrict_fun renamed to section_fun and takes different arguments (nms, vls)

doBy v4.6.14 (Release date: 2022-10-16)2022-10-17

  • Functions split_byrow() and split_bycol() added.
  • Function expr_to_fun added.
  • Functions scale2(), scaleBy() and scale_by() functions added
  • Funcetion recover_pca_data() added
  • added data: crime_rate (crimeRate with State variable now being rownames)
  • added data: prostate and personality

doBy v4.6.13 (Release date: 2022-05-02)2022-05-02

  • data carcassall: definition of factors corrected.
  • added data cad

doBy v4.6.11 (Release date: 2021-07-13)2021-07-13

  • restrict has been renamed to restrict_fun

  • summary_mb (mb for microbenchmark) added. Faster than summary from microbenchmark package.

doBy v4.6.10 (Release date: 2021-04-29)2021-04-29

Changes

  • specialize function removed.
  • restrict function replaces specialize.

# doBy v4.6.9 (Release date: 2021-03-09)2021-03-09

  • Improved documentation.

# doBy v4.6.8 (Release date: 2020-11-10)2020-11-10

  • head / tail added for splitByData (a list resulting from calling splitBy)

  • sapplyBy / sapply_by added

  • subSeq works on factors now (coerces to character)

  • sub_seq added; synonymous to subSeq

  • rle2 added; similar to rle but works also on factors

  • is_grouped added

  • math / mathmark dataset added.

doBy v4.6.7 (Release date: 2020-07-07)2020-07-08

  • interaction_plot (based on ggplot2 etc) added.

doBy v4.6.6 (Release date: 2020-06-16)2020-05-16

Bug fixes:

  • esticon.gls is now exported

  • xxx_by functions matching xxxBy introduced. xxx_by functions take data as first argument and work therefore well with the pipe.

doBy v4.6.5 (Release date: 2020-02-21)2020-02-21

Bug fixes:

  • Minor issues related to checks made by the development version of R.

doBy v4.6-4.1 (Release date: 2020-02-03)2020-02-03

Changes:

  • NAMESPACE file is being generated automatically

doBy v4.6-4 (Release date: 2020-02-01)

Changes:

  • Issue related to class vs inherits solved
  • NEWS file added
  • Update of fev data
  • cropyield data added.

doBy v4.6-3 (Release date: 2019-10-23)2019-10-23

Bug fixes:

  • LE_matrix etc. handles a dataframe correctly for the ‘at’ argument

Changes:

  • taylor function added
  • fev data from isdals added
  • lmBy reintroduced due to popular demand.

doBy v4.6-2 (Release date: 2018-08-30)2018-08-30

Changes

  • sampleBy and lapplyBy functions reintroduced due to popular demand.

doBy v4.6-1 (Release date: 2018-03-19)2018-03-20

Changes:

  • Previous functionality of core xxBy-functions reestablished to ensure that downstream packages work.
